Author: marktyler#0324
Content: So if i have 100 DEX, then what? Explain like I'm your grandmama

Author: CoinKing88#1540
Content: You will have 100 of 1 million DEX coins, so you will be eligible for 100/1.000.000th of the fee rewards by users who use the DEX api

Author: LocoMB#8593
Content: which will be paid out in .. KMD? to the same KMD address that the DEX are held in?

Author: Oszy#5734
Content: yes

Author: marktyler#0324
Content: The kmd in the dex address, at what point does it payout?

Author: Markus#5464
Content: @marktyler when the total balance in the fee address reaches 1 mil usd

Author: hastrup#8742
Content: @marktylerSo that means if the dex api gets to be in the top ten daily volume for an exchange, as of right now that around 1b usd. The fee is around 0.15% so for 1b daily volume you get 1.5 m in fees the dex coin gets 50% of the fee to share in 1m shares, that's 750k so if you got 100 dex coin and the daily wolume is 1b you would get 75 usd rev share for that day. The good think about dex api is everyone can make a gui on top of it So it's not only atomicdex that needs to get to 1b in daily volume but every other dex combine there is about 5+ project right now working on guis for dex api. :)
